pages.text: We're in luck, You're the only ancient human that we've found so far that was properly preserved by ice.$(br2)We can't wake you up yet though, it's far too dangerous exposing your feeble mind to the technological advances of our time.

So for now we're going to run you through a couple of tests, but don't worry, we estimate that it will only take a year or so to train your mind.$(br2)My name is $(primary)Atlas$() and I'll be your guide here.$(br2)The system indicates you're suffering from a temporary amnesia, all you need to know is that your name is $(primary)$(bold)REDACTED$() and you come from a small village in $(primary)$(bold)REDACTED$()

You can navigate between pages by $(item)Scrolling$() with your mouse, and exit out of entries by clicking the $(item)Right mouse button.$()$(br2)Also some items displayed in the manual can be $(item)SHIFT$() clicked and that will take you to the page which describes how you get that item.$(br2)Give it a go!
